In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star sword [[Primordial Jade Cutter]] (Sword) and the 5-star polearm [[Primordial Jade Winged-Spear]] (Polearm) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, 4-star weapons [[The Flute]] (Sword), [[Sacrificial Greatsword]] (Claymore), [[Rust]] (Bow), [[Eye of Perception]] (Catalyst), [[Favonius Lance]] (Polearm) and will get a huge drop-rate boost!

Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapon will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
